actions.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment clarifies provisions dealing with life and microgravity research, space commercialization, the Ultra Efficient Engine Technology program, and the 100th Anniversary of Flight Educational Initiative.
purpose: An amendment numbered 6 and printed in the Congressional Record to clarify provisions dealing with the International Space Station, Pathfinder Operability Demonstration Program, 100th Anniversary of Flight Educational Initiative, and the Ultra Efficient Engine.
